statements: SELECT * FROM product_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, issuing_body FROM product_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM product_certifications WHERE issuing_body = 'ISO';
SELECT certification_name, issuing_body FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_id, product_id, certification_name, certification_date, issuing_body FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY certification_date DESC, certification_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, certification_name, issuing_body FROM product_certifications WHERE issuing_body = 'ISO' LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT certification_id) AS total_certifications, MAX(certification_date) AS latest_certification_date FROM product_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM product_certifications GROUP BY certification_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_certifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT certification_type, certification_date FROM product_certifications WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_type FROM product_certifications;
SELECT agency_name, contact_email FROM certification_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_type = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM product_certifications WHERE certification_type = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT product_id, certification_type FROM product_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_type FROM product_certifications;
SELECT product_id, certification_type, agency_name FROM product_certifications LEFT JOIN certification_agencies ON product_certifications.product_id = certification_agencies.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM certification_agencies WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM ProductCertifications;
SELECT product_name, certification FROM ProductCertifications WHERE certification = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT product_name, certification FROM ProductCertifications WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT org_name, country FROM CertifyingOrganizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, org_id, issue_date FROM CertificationMappings WHERE issue_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, certification FROM ProductCertifications WHERE certification='ISO 9001'
SELECT org_name, country FROM CertifyingOrganizations ORDER BY country DESC
SELECT product_name, certification, issue_date FROM ProductCertifications JOIN CertificationMappings ON ProductCertifications.id = CertificationMappings.product_id
SELECT * FROM CertifyingOrganizations JOIN CertificationMappings ON CertifyingOrganizations.id = CertificationMappings.org_id

SELECT product_name, certification, issue_date, expiry_date, org_name FROM ProductCertifications JOIN CertificationMappings ON ProductCertifications.id = CertificationMappings.product_id JOIN CertifyingOrganizations ON CertifyingOrganizations.id = CertificationMappings.org_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM product_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, product_type FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Appliances' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' AND product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Appliances' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM products JOIN product_certifications ON products.product_id = product_certifications.product_id;

SELECT product_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM products JOIN product_certifications ON products.product_id = product_certifications.product_id WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT products.product_name, certification_agencies.agency_name, certification_expiry_date FROM products JOIN product_certification_relationship ON products.product_id = product_certification_relationship.product_id JOIN certification_agencies ON product_certification_relationship.agency_id = certification_agencies.agency_id WHERE certification_expiry_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY certification_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductCertifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM ProductCertifications WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT issuing_authority, expiry_date FROM ProductCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ProductCertifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC, certification_name ASC
SELECT certification_name, issuing_authority, product_id FROM ProductCertifications WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE

SELECT p.product_name, m.manufacturer_name, pc.category_name FROM Products p INNER JOIN ProductManufacturers m ON p.manufacturer = m.manufacturer_id INNER JOIN ProductCategories pc ON p.category = pc.category_id
SELECT pa.authority_name, pa.country, pc.category_name FROM CertificationAuthorities pa LEFT JOIN ProductCategories pc ON pa.authority_id = pc.category_id
SELECT product_id, certification_name, CAST(certification_date AS VARCHAR) AS cert_date FROM ProductCertifications WHERE certification_name LIKE 'ISO%' ORDER BY cert_date ASC
